website_summaries.verdict: The most rugged design by a top name in smartphone cases, and despite some quirks, a good choice for protecting your Galaxy S8 Plus from bumps, dings, and drops.
pros: Designed to absorb shock, thanks to the thick, double-layer build and extra edge protection
Good-looking, and available in 4 color options
cons: Has a bulky feel compared to most other phone cases
Material is stiff, and port covers can be difficult to maneuver
Harsh drops can still challenge it

customer_reviews.title: Feels very solid.
customer_reviews.text: Feels very solid and we'll protected. Quality I expect from Otterbox. It comes with rotating belt clip holster but no protective screen. No problem. I just ordered a tempered glass screen protector, one that doesn't state "case friendly" and it all fits together perfectly. I now have no fear of dropping my new S8 plus.
customer_reviews.author: joetheplumber

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Otter
customer_reviews.text: I have been an OtterBox case user for years and never once had an issue with their product. Until now, that is. I purchased this case for my new Samsung S8+ knowing full well Otter had not yet released a protective screen for it yet (although Otter's website does show a screen @ $44.00). However, that wasn't my main issue. When I placed the S8+ into the OtterBox case, as directed, none of the Samsung buttons would function! I repeated this process for two days and still nothing would work. Finally, in frustration I resolved to return this product, sadly disappointed in Otter and ordered a different product.
customer_reviews.author: James Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It without the Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Drop protection - Otterbox quality - Low Amazon price - Holster included Cons: - NO BUILT-IN SCREEN PROTECTOR - Poor color choices Otterbox really dropped the ball on this one. I have no idea why they would choose to eliminate the built-in screen protector for their Defender Series for the Galaxy S8+ but I know that it is causing me a lot of time and effort to remedy. I ended-up purchasing an "off brand" case that was surprisingly nice AND has a built-in screen protector. Color choices for this case are hideous and uninspired, it's like they aren't even trying anymore. If I didn't need a case that will holster I would have never purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: troobie

customer_reviews.title: Another great case!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't to sure that this case was going to be all that great but I should have trusted Otterbox more, they did a bang up job just like on every other device I've had for the last (mumble 10) years at least and this was no exception. Good case and has saved the phone already at least twice from my dropping the phone. The screen is totally un-obscured by the case and you get a good feel with all the usable area. This phone is pretty slippery as it is so this was a great upgrade to an amazing device already. And, they're based out of Colorado, so there's that too.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Northcote

customer_reviews.title: Not a great case. Too many issues with it and not enough protection for the screen
customer_reviews.text: The cons: ●The fingerprint reader is hard to access. ● I had known there is no screen protector but the screen is very exposed there is little to no bumper protecting it. ● The power button is extremely hard to press with this case on. ● The silicon coating around the outside is weak-- it seems like it will stretch easily. ● The hard outer shell barely closed around my phone. The pros: ● The camera seems very protected ● volume and Bixby buttons are good ● ports for charging and headphones are covered nicely
customer_reviews.author: Kaila

customer_reviews.title: I've been happy with the case
customer_reviews.text: After having it several months the rubber bit is starting to not fit quite perfectly into the plastic on the ends. For me this is forgiveable, I've been happy with the case. I was even able to trim the rubber over the Bixby button so I don't accidentally turn it on, a big plus for me since I hate Bixby
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: My phone can now withstand my toddler
customer_reviews.text: I am hard on phones unfortunately. Also I have a toddler who likes to take my phone frequently. Great case and can really protect your phone. My toddler has thrown my phone unfortunately several times and I have no scratches or breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Jaynee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👍
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant about this at first, because of it's slim profile and no built-in screen protection. But after accidentally dropping my Samsung Galaxy S8+ a few times, I would buy it again! It's curved enough at each end to protect the screen from damage, when my phone has fallen face first. I love the slim design! It had both a hard plastic case and a rubber like outer case for double protection and fits in my pocket without the bulkiness of some of the other Otterbox cases. The case also has a good feel to it without being slippery like the plastic cases. It cleans up easily with a damp cloth (after removing it from the phone of course).
customer_reviews.author: joyce

customer_reviews.title: Durable but tough port access
customer_reviews.text: The case is wonderful with two downsides. I knew it wouldn't work with the dex dock, but it's a real pain to take it off if I want to use it. Also, the flaps at the bottom that cover the ports are rather rigid and I'm afraid it puts a little too much strain on the charger/headphones. The rubber also looks like it's ever so slightly too large for the plastic around the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Smith

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: This protected my phone pretty good my only complaint is that by where the camera was located the rubber started to peel after 2 weeks and made my case look like crap. I was kind of disappointed because these cases are pretty pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I will always have an otterbox case but I will never again by their hard screen protectors
customer_reviews.text: I always get an otterbox for my phone if I didn't every phone I ever owned would have been broken over and over again. For the first time I bought the otterbox glass for my phone and I was severely disappointed in the cover. It made it alot harder to do anything to the touch screen even with the sensitivity turned all the way up and it broke within a couple days of having it on.
customer_reviews.author: William B.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know why everyone loves these cases. This case didnt protect the phone at all. It was dropped from a low height and didnt protect the phone at all! It still got cracked!
customer_reviews.author: Serena H.

customer_reviews.title: Same cover was 60.00 at the retail store great price and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Looks very sturdy. Glad otter box quit putting the front cover on as it made it very hard for the person your talking to be able to hear you. It is in 3 pieces and directions are just pictures with no instructions. It took me a few minutes to figure it out I can usually do the picture directions fine but this one would have helped with just a few words of what I was doing and looking at
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: wasn't completely satisfied, then bought this one
customer_reviews.text: Bought a different case, wasn't completely satisfied, then bought this one, and I love it! Has a much better grip texture, fits my phone well, and the phone can go face in (help protect the screen better) or out! Is slightly looser face in though, and maybe not as secure. Update-it does work as a stand if you squeeze the clip open a little harder. It will click into open position and prop the phone up. Works better landscape view than portrait.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good protection but bad craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Buttons are stiff. The flap that covers the charging port is very stiff and I do not like how it puts a lot of pressure on the part that plugs into the phone (and the phone port itself). It's a noticeable bend when you release the flap. The phone isn't secured all the way around the case, so when I hold the phone to film (main reason I bought the phone) there is cracking/popping from the soft rubber case pushing against the hard plastic frame of the case. In videos, it's obnoxiously loud.
customer_reviews.author: S2Media

customer_reviews.title: Better low price on this OtterBox!
customer_reviews.text: I changed cases to another brand from OtterBox a while ago due to OtterBox being so expensive. Great product, but too expensive. My last non-OtterBox case didn't protect my S8+ and the back of my phone shattered with a hard hit on the ground. I searched for another case and saw this OtterBox Defender Series for twenty something dollars. SOLD. I hope this price stays this low for OtterBox products because it will be the only case I buy! Paying around $50 for a case? No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: PhatMatt

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 out of 5 because I love the protection it offers but I don't like how the rubber starts to separate a little from the main base. If the rubber never separated then I would've given a 5....I will say that I have a kid and she loves to mess with my phone. She even threw my phone a number of times since I've had this case and my screen is still good
customer_reviews.author: At'Tifa M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this Otterbox!
customer_reviews.text: I have never previously owned an Otterbox. But, I love this thing right out of the box after some struggles to get it installed correctly. It took me three trys to get it right. That's because it is so precisely made to fit the phone. If you do not take your time and care with installation, you'll get it wrong just like I did. Once, finally got it installed correctly, it works like a charm! I am completely happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: LG Carter

customer_reviews.title: BROKE IN UNDER A YEAR!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my Otterbox for less than a year and it fell a few inches on the table and is already cracked. The plastic is supposed to be shatterproof but clearly it's not. Tried to contact the seller to return it and I've gotten no response and since I didn't order from the Otterbox website they won't replace it either. Very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Sarena

customer_reviews.title: OtterBoxes Are Simply The Best
customer_reviews.text: Fits my phone like a glove - as always. OtterBox phone cases are of the highest quality materials and provide top-notch protection from mishaps. My Samsung Galaxy S8+ has survived several three foot falls onto concrete because of the OtterBox's design. If you want the best protection for your phone, buy OtterBox.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: If you know cases then you know that otter box is at the top of the heap when it comes to good reliable quality
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as advertised. If you know cases then you know that otter box is at the top of the heap when it comes to good reliable quality! It fits the phone perfectly and provides strength and safety for your expensive electronics while staying perfectly fashionable and offering reliable grip for those all to often slippery finishes. These come in an array of sensible colors and shipping was fast and on time! A great choice for anyone searching for a quality case! This is a purchased item at full price and this is a fair and unbiased review!
customer_reviews.author: Bookman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent case, would recommend buying a tempered glass screen ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case, would recommend buying a tempered glass screen protector to go with it Both have saved my phone from certain destruction.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Good case and not too bulky as some others have ...
customer_reviews.text: Good case and not too bulky as some others have claimed. The lack of 4 stars is due to the charger receptacle cover is a nuisance to use and the power button is difficult to push. Most od the cases are also.
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with this case
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to many reviews I like this case. The outside doesn't feel as rubbery as the other OtterBox cases I've had, so that's a slight negative. Also I absolutely hate that the cover to the port flips upward. It doesn't sound like a big deal, but it is very frustrating trying to connect it to the charger. I'm also not sure how well this case will protect due to the curvature of the phone, but I haven't dealt with that yet. All in all I like my OtterBox.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Great Heavy Duty protection for Samsung S8+
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased a Samsung S8+ and needed something to protect my investment. this phone was 1/3 the cost of my new car - 390 hp FORD in 1969. The case went on very easily and looks VERY Sturdy. Does NOT include a screen protector. I tried a Danteng Glass protector and it did not fit properly. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: BDM

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY thing I dont like about Otterbox is the outer part of the case ...
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY thing I dont like about Otterbox is the outer part of the case relaxes with age and is loose around the corners but still does the job it was designed to do. That being said I have NEVER had a phone break while in one of these cases. I just replaced a Note4 that was in an Otterbox Defender case its entire life and the phone still looks brand new. The ONLY reason I replaced the Note4 is because I used it to death.. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox defender case
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with screen protector so bought one separately. Case fits great and son loves it for his phone. Works in automotive shop so needs the protection if drops his phone while working or cars and trucks which includes the big dump and snow plow trucks. Highly recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie53

customer_reviews.title: Built for phone droppers....
customer_reviews.text: ...truck drivers construction workers well you get the idea. I literally dropped brushed banged tossed ( sometimes on purpose when football score did not pleased my wishes) yet my android still up and runnning. Totally recommend to anyone in my class of people.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Best case available.
customer_reviews.text: As with most otterboxes, very high quality and keeps phone very protected. My guy and I each had one on our phones. So when it was time for our son to upgrade, we got him one for his phone. He's very rough on his phones, but with this case, we're confident he's protected.
customer_reviews.author: Becca from Upstate, NY

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for my S8+
customer_reviews.text: Good protection for my S8+ because you don't get full side protection because of the infinity screen on the S8+ without going with an enclosed case. I added an amFilm Glass Screen Protector because it has great reviews, curved glass side protection and an installation tray whereas the Otterbox Alpha Glass has none of those.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Trapani

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone case
customer_reviews.text: I have a galaxy s8 plus which is not from a long time ago but there are new phones being released every other day, so I love that I can come on to amazon and choose from alot of options for a reliable case. I only use Otterbox items, which has been smart cause my phone is still in mint condition. The cases are so durable. I have dropped this phone a few times in warehouses , parking lots etc and the case has always and I mean always kept my phone safe, THANK OTTERBOX FOR HELPING CLUMSY PEOPLE LIKE ME
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Walmart sells the same case for over 50. Mines held up in the shop, my 1 year old son, and my abuse. It has cracked on the screen side frame, but still protects. only downfall is it doesnt allow a glass screen protector. S8 screen is sturdy but I have gotten a few scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best case I have ever used --- withmy S6 I ...
customer_reviews.text: Best case I have ever used --- withmy S6 I broke the glass 3 times with other cases, when I got the Otterbox it saved my phone on multiple occasions. The S8 Plus is the same quality case I would expect fro Otterbox. Not a big deal to buy a $8 shield rather than using the built in one Otterbox used to provide. In all honestly the IQ shield I bought is way better that the built in shield anyways - It fits the curved screen really nicely whereas the S6 Otterbox shield felt dense because of the air gap and dulled the image from the screen
customer_reviews.author: Canadian 5 Star

customer_reviews.title: Think Twice
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that this didn't come with a screen cover. I've always used otterbox in the defender series, but without the cover, I'll consider other brands. Because of this, my screen got scratched on a new S8. Have never scratched a phone in 22 years of cellphone usage, so obviously I am very safe.
customer_reviews.author: radworkr

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last over time
customer_reviews.text: After 2.5 years the rubber is stretched, I have to put the volume button in the hole to use the volume (because it stretched out of the hole) the hard case is broken and I had to super glue it together. The holster broke after the first 6 months. To follow up, I've never dropped it from much more than waist hieght, it was great for the first 6 months. But just got worse and worse as time went. Don't see myself buying another otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: BlaisOne

customer_reviews.title: Awesome color and case. Ideal for heavy duty environments.
customer_reviews.text: I got it for $11 so an amazing deal! I do dislike the bottom design, seems like it blocks my phone speaker at times (i get alot more "I cant hear you" and my google assistant takes a bit of yelling at certain angles. Over time the rubber covering the headphone jack and charge port will wear out and start to warp the bottom rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Great case so far!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great case. It's a VERY tight fit for the phone though. I can see how that is a good thing but I wouldn't buy it if you plan on switching back and forth between cases often. It's easy to hold and so far doesn't slip within the hands. It has very good grip. I like how the edges rise above the screen of the phone so "hopefully" it better protects against falls. The only real downside I see is that that covers over the aux port and charge port are pretty stiff. Trying to get the charger or aux cord in is definitely a two handed job and even then it's a bit of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice But No Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: The OtterBox, in my opinion, is the best protection for a cellphone. It works great and certainly protects it from dropping or casual use (pockets and pocketbooks). It is less protective of my last one (for an earlier phone) because of the lack of a screen protector. That is why it did not get five (5) stars.
customer_reviews.author: PAE

customer_reviews.title: Protective Case for Phone
customer_reviews.text: What I like about my case? It is an otter box phone case. These are the most sturdiest cases I have used on my phones. What I dislike about this case it that it is not a full enclosure case. It is a "open face" model/series.
customer_reviews.author: T_Mc

customer_reviews.title: Very tough cases.
customer_reviews.text: This defender is very durable and has stood up to a couple tumbles already. The color is pretty cool, but shows dirt and grease fairly quickly (I should have gotten black). It does clean up nice. These cases are my go to because they're very tough and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: David Earhart

customer_reviews.title: Nice, durable case!
customer_reviews.text: Otterbox did not disappoint! Protects my phone as it should (I drop it quite often), and when I want to clean it I just take it apart and put the case on the top rack of the dish washer, and it comes out brand new! Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy R.

customer_reviews.title: I Gifted The Best
customer_reviews.text: Gifted ... Great so far! He said he likes the OtterBox for his new phone as it's sturdy, and he feels his phone is safe. He said he uses clip on the back 2 ways: to hold his phone securely and also to clip to him when he goes out. The best feature is security of his phone. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Robin

customer_reviews.title: Just order it now.
customer_reviews.text: I love the belt holder. I also like the case itself. I've dropped my phone like most of you who are looking at this product. OtterBox has the best customer service ever. No one backs their products like OtterBox. I was smart enough to order mine when I ordered my phone. It went straight from the Samsung box into the OtterBox. I always do this. I love having a clean, scratch free phone. As much as phones cost, you owe it to yourself to get and OtterBox.
customer_reviews.author: Retired Lt.

customer_reviews.title: 2.5 weeks old and outside layer is peeling already!
customer_reviews.text: I get this same case for every phone I get and I normally is great. On this case, that I have had only for a few weeks, it already is falling apart. The outside layer is peeling. I have a work phone with the exact same case and it has yet to look like this one and it is 6 months old, still looks new. I may have got a bad batch or something but definitely wouldn't buy another from here.
customer_reviews.author: ryan w.

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: It offers great protection and I like not the clip is also a stand. BUT DO NOT ORDER A HARD SCREEN PROTECTOR EVEN THE OTTERBOX SCREEN PROTECTOR AS IY WILL NOT WORK WITH THIS CASE. With this case you don't need a hard screen protector just a regular film works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tawney

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Durable. Ordered this for my dad, as I have had the same case for my phone for about a year, and it has been great. Some spots are peeling, and the corner is bowing out as I've also used it to hold my license/credit card between the 2 layers when I didn't feel like bringing along my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: As you eould expect from otterbox.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, attractive, minimalist. Excellent protection. I tried glass screen protectors with this but found it difficult to use around the edges. Removed the screen protector but feel comfortable that the otter box design will do it's job.
customer_reviews.author: JMACVOL

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not happy it's missing screen protection
customer_reviews.text: The protector works fine, however the lack of a built in screen protector is why I gave it 3 stars. I've always been happy with otterboxes but this was the first I replaced soon after buying. The glass protectors fit well but they fall off easily due to small adhesive area contact with the screen. I purchased another with the built in screen protector that I was much happier with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality case as to be expected from Otter
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality case as to be expected from Otter. Using certain screen protectors seems to make the case not fit properly, does not allow the power button to work properly. Also had a problem installing and using the Otterbox Alpha glass with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Case
customer_reviews.text: Great protection for the Samsung S8+ WAY better than the Otter box Symmetry. Symmetry allowed my phone to get damaged (cracked screen). Defender is much better. Wish I bought the Defender first. After Symmetry didn't protect my phone, I was so mad I was never buying another Otter box, but changed my mind.
customer_reviews.author: ShakaBrah

customer_reviews.title: Worst phone protection case ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst phone protection case ever! I hate the case because you can't use the button. Plastic shield has broken 3 times. Otter Box should be ashamed for selling this garbage and Amazon shouldn't care it. Horrible ....
customer_reviews.author: Old Line State Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Cant say enough about otter box. Hopefully it's a real otter Box and not a knock off. I'm not one of those people that can tell but if it's a knock off its damn good. Otterbox has saved my phone many times but I just don't like the fact it doesn't have a screen protector Built-in
customer_reviews.author: Mammadiva

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this case a lot
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy this case a lot. Feels like it will protect my phone if I drop it, which I haven't had to test yet! It puts a little bulk to my phone, which I like because it makes it easier to hold, but if you like it more streamline you won't get the protection. I gave it only 4 out of 5 stars because I wish there were more colors to choose from, but that is really my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Morkila

customer_reviews.title: Love Otterbox!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Otterbox for years. They may be a bit more expensive than some cases, but they are worth every penny. Drop your phone just a time or two, and they pay for themselves immediately in an unbroken phone.
customer_reviews.author: Don't tread on me

customer_reviews.title: Amazing job with reducing how bulky outer box used to ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing job with reducing how bulky outer box used to be Good case and nice looking belt clip If you are interested in saving your cell phone and truly protecting it , this is the case to buy no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Leo A Hosler

customer_reviews.title: Phone case works well when it holds your phone in the case
customer_reviews.text: Ive dropped this phone a time or two an no damage to the phone. It is a huge pain to get the case on an off which isnt such a big deal for the durability and protection but just having it in my back pocket and sittin on it it ripped my phone from the case which broke the case and now im worried my phone will continue to pop out of the case everytime i turn around
customer_reviews.author: Missdawn

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line, but also expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Expensive but it's top of the line and you pay what you get for. These otter box cases are not like the old ones that have the plastic screen cover, which at first I wasn't sure about but the case is still designed to protect screen from drop so your screen will never actually touch the floor if dropped face first.
customer_reviews.author: John Macri

customer_reviews.title: Solid case- can withstand hard fall on tar
customer_reviews.text: The instillation of this case made me nervous- you put the hard plastic shell around the phone first, then cover with the rubber. The shell is two halves-- didnt know this when i first went to put my phone in it... thought i would break the phone! Durability= 100%. I have broken so many phones, but never one using an otter box. I drop my phone face down on pavement often and so far still safe. If you want to keep your new phone safe, take it out of the box, and put it right into an otter box!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: No other case comes close
customer_reviews.text: Ask any Otter box owner who has dropped there phone. And they will tell you hands down these are the best. I've dropped my phone while on the back of an eighteen wheeler. And its like it never happened. A lot of people don't like the screenless case. But if you buy gorilla glass and this case its still a lot cheaper then a screen replacement.

customer_reviews.title: Nice price great sound sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: Enclosure are finger reader is a bit tight, but with effort can work. Otherwise so8nd, sturdy product. Only lacks screen protector, which despite Corning claims is still needed just not as critical.
customer_reviews.author: GrandOak

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to push on button
customer_reviews.text: Since you have to wake up the phone by pushing the side button, it gets used a lot. And after 1 day with this case my finger and wrist hurts because you have to push so hard!!! Have to return. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best phone case ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best case I have ever had. Looks great, functions even better. I do have some intermittent glitches with proximity chargers that I am not sure are do to.the case.
customer_reviews.author: Ja Mata

customer_reviews.title: Fast turn around from time of order to actual receipt of merchandise.
customer_reviews.text: The portion that encases the phone is incredibly durable and does a fantastic job in protecting the phone; even from falls on concrete or pavement. The belt clipping system is less durable and I've had to replace that piece numerous times over the years. Definately would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Liebl

customer_reviews.title: Stretches out have to rebuy constantly!
customer_reviews.text: I have to keep buying these every 3 or 4 months. They ALL stretch out and get loose and wont fit in the holder. You would think they would be made to last as long as your phone!
customer_reviews.author: Dayton L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice phone protection
customer_reviews.text: VERY good protection for your phone! This version doesn't come with a screen protector built in but that's because of the unique curved screen of the S8+. I like the belt holster approach and since I'm in industrial areas a lot, the protection is a must. Yes, it does fatten up the phone a but but it sure does make the phone easy to hang onto!
customer_reviews.author: T. Geery

customer_reviews.title: not enough of a lip to raise phone from ground if dropped
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked it a lot better if it came with a screen protector. Even with the otterbox case, my phone screen still shattered
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I purchased because of the name Otterbox... It has not lived up to the name. It replaced a cover I really liked from another company that muffled my voice when talking into the phone... The first weekend I had it my camera glass broke because of the seat belt receptacle... I added the Otterbox protective glass and it cracked when snapping into the Otterbox supplied belt holder... didn't even get a chance to drop it... It does keep it protected and the actual glass didn't break so I am giving it 2 stars but I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed that this case doesn't have the screen protector like my old one did. I have always been a fan of the otter boxes but having an all in one was just awesome. I will say the only real think I have noticed is the buttons are very firm and hard to press, this could just be a break in period for a new case though. I don't recall if my old one had that in the beginning or not.
customer_reviews.author: Hubcap

customer_reviews.title: A Good Choice for Protecting your Galaxy S+
customer_reviews.text: A great assist to keep your Galaxy S+ safe and much easier to hang onto with these new thin phones. I had another Otter Box for a phone several years ago and it to worked beautifully. Easy to pull the parts off and then wrap them back onto your Galaxy S+ and snap into place. Great!
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Great value & service for hard to find product
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what we needed for the Galaxy Samsung 8+ phone, which had been discontinued in retail stores. The price was great, the product was authentic, and the service was delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Protect Screen - Power Button is Hard to Push
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the quality. I've only been using it for two months and already my screen is cracked in two corners from a small drop. Also, from the beginning the power button has been really hard to push and now that it's broken in it's like the power button keeps getting softer and much harder to push in. Taking screenshots takes several attempts to get the power button pushed in on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: otterbox always
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a five because otterbox has saved my phone many times. The only thing I do not like is that there is no screen protector. My phone has a curved edge and I have cracked several screen protectors so maybe this will be better. I wont have to pay for more screen protectors. I like the way this feels in my hands. It feels very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Otter Box Defender SUCKS.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Otter Box Defender for years and been very pleased up to now. This one for the Samsung S8+ in one word -- sucks. The rubber buttons are a tight fit and takes a lot of pressure to make them function. It does look like quality control on this product has been suspended. I'll be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Lamberth

customer_reviews.title: great for my phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a while ago, and it still works perfect. made of strong plastic, and had a perfect fit to my android phone. Bought several for several phones, and they are all going strong
customer_reviews.author: Carol Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with quality & price
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this case!! Wpuldnt use anything else. Have dropped my phone many times and never a crack!! Very durable. Price was awesome. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: George Belch

customer_reviews.title: Best protection for your phone
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Samsung Galaxy phone. I drop my phone about 5-10 times a day and never worry about breaking my phone with the Otter Defender series. It has protected my phone when I have dropped it on concrete and when I dropped it down of concrete stairs. Highly recommend for clumsy people like me. Makes your phone look a little bulky but so worth it knowing that your phone will be fine
customer_reviews.author: Krisztina Juhasz

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves the case it's the perfect color for the lions fan in you. The otter box case holder for his belt is very strong and stays in place. Worth the money 100%
customer_reviews.author: Joandlo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely does its job! Highly recommend, especially if ur a prone phone dropper!
customer_reviews.text: These cases along with a tempered glass screen protector IS LIFE! Our truck ran my phone over and when I noticed.... it was still ringing and I picked it right up off the ground answered it & went about my day (NO DAMAGE)
customer_reviews.author: kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great Product at a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: The case fits my phone like a glove and provides excellent protection at a price that does not break the bank. Excellent job as always, OtterBox!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Brion

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Had a black one
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Had a black one, just like this. My husband and I have the same phones, same color, and same black Otterbox. I felt I needed to purchase a different color (since we both started picking up one another's phones). Great product, protects the phone very well!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for my Samsung Galaxy 8+
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, like the feel, it's solid. IF I drop it - no worries. Great product. Everyone should have an Otterbox on their phone.
customer_reviews.author: EmElDee4

customer_reviews.title: OtterBox is the best!
customer_reviews.text: I've had to replace 2 different 8+ at $99 a piece because the back spiderwebbed right over the fingerprint sensor both times. I jumped on buying 8+ before OtterBox had a cover and regretted it as I've always sworn by their products. Even using this cover screenless has been a great improvement. 2 active dogs mean that I drop my phone pretty regularly. After almost 2 months not a scratch on it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Wysocki

customer_reviews.title: It's an Otterbox. You cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my Samsung s8+. Nice color. Makes my phone feel secure in my hand. I like it. Nothing negative to say about it. It's an Otterbox. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy that the case broke, delighted that Otterbox has their replacement warranty
customer_reviews.text: After 13 months the tab/support piece between the power cover and headphone jack cover broke. Not good. Now the covers stick out. Otterbox has a replacement warranty. So I'm getting a new case for the body of shipping ($6.35). Disappointed that this piece broke. Delighted that otterbox has their replacement warranty.
customer_reviews.author: B Lazar

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second case and theres not a single scratch, scuff or crack anywhere on my phone. I've dropped it so many times and it just bounces a little and is totally fine. The rubber outer bit will stretch over time so you'll have to keep an eye on it and the plastic will eventually crack but it will protect your phone. Just don't be crazy and throw your phone into the floor/wall and it'll do its job for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bittner

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Cell Phone Protection
customer_reviews.text: I order the Defender Series edition Otterbox cell phone cases exclusively for cell phones in use by police detectives. While I do order replacement cases occasionally (usually for a broken belt clip/holster), we have not replaced any cell phones due to damage the Otterbox case protects them from. And THAT is what is most important.
customer_reviews.author: prb

customer_reviews.title: Great case, great price, durable!
customer_reviews.text: A great price for a great case. Definitely protects it in the back and sides very well and the material it's made of is easy to hold/grip. The screen is protected at the top and bottom however the screen is exposed on the sides that makes it susceptible to still getting damaged. I will always used a tempered screen protector so at least it adds a layer of protection in that area. I guess they have to leave the sides like that for the side swiping features on this phone. Other than that, would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit perfect. One spot over a button wouldn't close completely. Wouldn't fit over glass screen saver at all. Also made it to thick to fit in my pants phone pocket. Overall, they are good cases, but this one didn't fit my needs. Went with thinner Incipio case instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not bulky like other Defenders but someone mentioned a cracked screen from ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks Neat Case looks neat, attractive, not bulky like other Defenders but someone mentioned a cracked screen from a fall and yes the screen is more exposed - I guess because of the phone design and features. I will endeavour not to drop on the screen. Ah well, we shall see. The port closures continue to be a nuisance however.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Reid

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The product I received had the Otterbox brand on it, however the phone case I received was made of cheap thin plastic that broke easily and within days of normal usage. Upon opening the package, I noticed how fragile the case was so I went out of my way to gingerly handle this case and it still broke within a few days of receipt. Makes me wonder if what I received was a true Otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and keeps phone safe. Phone stays in great condition no matter what the case is out through. Would definitely recommend and re purchase
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Logsdon

customer_reviews.title: On/Off button too hard to press
customer_reviews.text: This is a great protector BUT the on/off button on the side is very hard to press. It doesn't get worn in/easier over time either. This is only an issue for turning off the phone since you can turn on your phone by pressing the screen at the bottom. The volume buttons are a little easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Gator

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this case on his phone. When he got his phone we purchased a case exactly like this and it has held up 4 several years so he wanted another one exactly like it
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Dropped twice since purchase
customer_reviews.text: You probably spent 8 bills. Don't be cheap invest in the extra protection. Gorilla glass or no gorilla glass.
customer_reviews.author: William E Lambert

customer_reviews.title: definitely provides adequate protection at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: The design is such that if it fell and landed face down your screen wouldn't make contact or crack. It is slim compared to previous otterbox defender models. But sometimes it will move around in my pocket or bag and volume/power buttons will get pressed. But not a huge deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the otterbox covers for any phones
customer_reviews.text: I love the otterbox covers for any phones. I have dropped my phone/s many times and have never had to worry about it breaking because the otterbox protects it so well. I will never buy a different brand for any other future phones.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Monkeys

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox is good but bulky cover
customer_reviews.text: We have used Ballistic and other cases that were easier to slide in your pocket than this on our other phones but this OtterBox Defender will do. It is bulky and has no screen protector but seems like it is good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron D

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Won't own a phone without the matching otterbox. This is the best style for protection without interference.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Kemnitz

customer_reviews.title: Durable and just as described. We're always order otterbox ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable and just as described. We're always order otterbox for my husband's phones. He is a lineman and very tough on his phones. This case does the job very well!
customer_reviews.author: leighann

customer_reviews.title: Love the clip
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it he had a lifeproof case before and let's just say it wasent life proof at all and this comes with a clip so you can wear it on your pants instead of placing the phone in your pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Chere mckee

product_meta.title: Otterbox Defender Series Screenless Edition for Samsung Galaxy s8+ - Frustration Free Packaging - Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingWorry Less While You’re Working, Adventuring and Living When You Defend Your Device Against Drops, Dirt and Scrapes. The New Screen less Defender Series Is Specifically Designed for the Galaxy s8+ Curved Touchscreen. Combining a Solid Internal Shell With a Resilient Outer Slipcover, Defender Series Deflects the Action and Accidents That Come Your Way Every Day. Plus, the Included Holster Doubles as a Kickstand for Hands-Free Viewing.
feature_bullets: Compatible with Samsung Galaxy S8+ (only, Not the Galaxy S8)
Multi-layer defense: solid inner shell and soft outer cover (No Built in Screen Protector)
Belt-clip holster included that doubles as a kickstand for hands-free media viewing.
Port covers keep out dust and debris; Polycarbonate shell
Includes OtterBox limited lifetime warranty (see website for details) and 100% authentic. Materials - synthetic rubber

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,485 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
